Apologus.text: Can you buy more on same terms

Appendo.text: What price can you buy at

Appensus.text: What price did you buy at

Apporto.text: Call at post office for letters

Appotus.text: Call here on your way to business

Apprime.text: Call here on your way from business

Aprilis.text: Call on me at my office

Apronia.text: Call on me at my office at once

Apsyctos.text: Calling on you to-day on an important matter

Apyrinus.text: Calling on you to-day on important business

Apyrum.text: Calling on you to-day with reference to ---

Aqua.text: Calling on you to-day as desired

Aquator.text: Cancel my previous telegram, and substitute following

Arabilis.text: Cancel orders at any cost, reply by telegram

Aranea.text: Cancel orders if not already attended to

Araneola.text: Cancel orders if not already attended to, letter follows
